ActorFrame.Condition:
(function() local from, where local function ex()
-- -- -- -- Add your scripts here -- -- -- -- --
from 'lib' load 'libactor'
-- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --
end local where='' function from(s) where=s..'.' end function load(s,...) local folder = '.' .. GAMESTATE:GetCurrentSong():GetSongDir() local file = string.gsub(where, '%.', '/') .. s .. '.lua' local path = folder .. file local func, err = loadfile(path)
if func then Trace('[Loading] ' .. path) return func() end
local additional = PREFSMAN:GetPreference('AdditionalSongFolders') local _, si = string.find(folder, 'Songs/') local base = string.sub(folder, si)
for w in string.gfind(additional,'[^,]+') do path = w .. base .. file func = loadfile(path) if func then Trace('[Loading] ' .. path) return func() end end
error(err) end ex() return false end)()
